22:14 <Michitux> sdumitriu: hi, vmassol told me that you are the one who registered the Community Development and Marketing devroom at FOSDEM that you want to share with the wiki community - is that correct? I'm from DokuWiki and I'm wondering if you already know some more details.  
22:14 <sdumitriu> Hi Michitux  
22:14 <sdumitriu> Yes  
22:15 <Michitux> sdumitriu: what exactly have you planned in this room?  
22:15 <Michitux> and do I remember correctly that it's only on Saturday?  
22:18 <sdumitriu> Yes, just Saturday  
22:27 <Michitux> sdumitriu: do you already have some kind of plan what will happen in that room? will there be talks? or just meeting people?  
22:28 <sdumitriu> Well, you could read the list archives at https://lists.fosdem.org/private/cdm-devroom/ if you subscribe to the mailing list  
22:28 <sdumitriu> There will be talks  
22:28 <sdumitriu> Here's the announcement:https://lists.fosdem.org/pipermail/fosdem/2012-November/001656.html  
22:32 <Michitux> okay, subscription request sent  
22:36 <sdumitriu> Aproved  
22:53 <Michitux> sdumitriu: vmassol said you were going to share it with us all, in which way will that happen? or will there be only these talks?  
23:58 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki
